p: Viruses (RSV, RBSDV and SRBSDV)-infected rice leaves collected from the field were stored at −80°C in the lab (61) and RGSV-infected rice plant was provided by Prof. Taiyun Wei (Fujian Agriculture and Forestry University). RSV particles were extracted from RSV-infected rice leaves as described previously [ 62], and purified virions were stored at −80°C.
